description: Spawn Claude Code instances from 6 platforms when 'Dear Claude' is mentioned.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.sns45/dear-claude

environmentVariables.description: HTTP server port for webhooks (default: 3334)
environmentVariables.name: DEAR_CLAUDE_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Override Tailscale hostname for webhook URLs (auto-detected if not set)
environmentVariables.name: TAILSCALE_HOSTNAME

environmentVariables.description: GitHub OAuth App or GitHub App client ID
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: GitHub OAuth App or GitHub App client secret
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: GitHub webhook signature secret
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: GitHub personal access token (alternative to OAuth)
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: GitHub App ID (for installation-based auth)
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_APP_ID

environmentVariables.description: Path to GitHub App private key PEM file
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Linear OAuth application client ID
environmentVariables.name: LINEAR_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Linear OAuth application client secret
environmentVariables.name: LINEAR_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Linear webhook signing secret
environmentVariables.name: LINEAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Linear personal API key (alternative to OAuth)
environmentVariables.name: LINEAR_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Jira Cloud domain (e.g. 'mycompany' for mycompany.atlassian.net)
environmentVariables.name: JIRA_DOMAIN

environmentVariables.description: Jira account email for API authentication
environmentVariables.name: JIRA_USER_EMAIL

environmentVariables.description: Jira API token from id.atlassian.com
environmentVariables.name: JIRA_API_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Shared secret for Jira webhook URL validation
environmentVariables.name: JIRA_WEBHOOK_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: GitLab personal or project access token
environmentVariables.name: GITLAB_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: GitLab webhook secret token
environmentVariables.name: GITLAB_WEBHOOK_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Notion OAuth integration client ID
environmentVariables.name: NOTION_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Notion OAuth integration client secret
environmentVariables.name: NOTION_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Notion internal integration token (alternative to OAuth)
environmentVariables.name: NOTION_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Notion webhook verification secret
environmentVariables.name: NOTION_WEBHOOK_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Absolute path to Obsidian vault directory for file watching
environmentVariables.name: OBSIDIAN_VAULT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Giphy API key for embedding GIF reactions in responses
environmentVariables.name: GIPHY_API_KEY
